entry.title: Unpacking a Python regular expression
entry.summary: I recently answered a question from Harsha Nalore on StackOverflow that involved using Ansible to extract the output of a command sent to a BigIP device of some sort. My solution – which I claim to be functional, but probably not optimal – involved writing an Ansible filter module to parse the output. That filter made use of a complex-looking regular expression. Harsha asked for some details on that regular expression works, and the existing StackOverflow answer didn’t really seem the write place for that: so, here we are.
